_source.text: After a brief period of consolidation, the Aussie edged lower against the greenback as US retail sales came in much better than expected.

text: After a brief period of **consolidation**, the Aussie edged lower against the greenback as US **retail** sales came in much **better** **than** expected.

_source.text: After all, if you spend time working out a nice flight plan and log (or download it from a computerized flight planning system), your time is better used if the route you plan is the route you are actually going to get -- or at least close to it.

text: computerized **flight** **planning** system), your time **is** **better** used if the route you plan is the route you are actually going to get -- or at least close to it.
